divs: sighting detailson or about october of 1992( near halloween)at 10:30 pm i was living at 11464 dennison road forestvlle new york,i was waiting for my stanley sales lady to deliver my order.i was looking down the road an saw many colored lights flashing about 1\4 mile away.when my friend came i asked her to look down the road and asked her if she knew what the flashing lights were?she said she saw them when she came down the road and saw them too.she said'lets drive down there and take a look.i said i think they are too far away as they looked like they were over lake erie.whe got in the car and were watching the lights as we approached they were already up to where we were.we pulled over to the side of the road.as we were approaching one of them had shot away side ways and the second one seem to follow.the 3d one was starting to move away slowly as we were under or actaully it was hovering over near us.there was no sound and i guess thats what was the scarriest.they were very large.the lights kept flashing.we both got out . i went around to the passenger side to be near my friend.i got a littl queezy and scared and kept saying what in the he-- is that.i told her we should get back in the car and we did.this object stayed over there for it seemed like 5 minutes but i guess it was only a couple of minutes.the 3rd on streak sieways to catch up with the other 2 as it seemed as though they were waiting for it.when it got nearer to the other two they just streaked and dissapeared in a distance.we got back in the car and she dropped me off without eiher one of us saying too much to each other.when i got back home i called a radio station to see if anyone called in.there was no report.i called the niagara falls air base there wasn't any .report.they gave me a number to call. that was a governmment # for reporting suspicious things??it was friday night late and there as no answer.i waited until monday and called the nuber.i reported it what i saw and they said, someone would get back to me.no one ever did that!i have never written about it before today i was on the aol people chats and i read about other people saw things.i put my story on and last night i saw another special about ufo on tv and i decided that i needed tell someone who would believe me.as you feel like a nut and no one would beive you anyway unless they saw the same thing.i don't like to think about it and usually i don't.that is my story &iswear it is true.i asked my friend why she wasn;t as excited and afraid as i was and she told me she saw this before.and you know i did believe her.i believe there is something that our government knows and is not telling us.why???
trends: There has been one other sighting in Silver Creek
There were no other sightings in Silver Creek on or around October 28th 1992
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
